abstract: Managed futures funds, which have found success in the financial crisis by betting on the ups and downs of everyone else, have finally hit their own slump.
snippet: Managed futures funds, which have found success in the financial crisis by betting on the ups and downs of everyone else, have finally hit their own slump.
lead_paragraph: Managed futures funds, which bet on the ups and downs of stocks, bonds, commodities and currencies, have been crowing for years about their performance during the financial crisis.

headline.main: Sluggish Market Stalls Funds That Thrive on Direction
